mechanics.outcome: The touched creature gains the Darkvision trait out to 60 feet for the spell's duration

mechanics.trigger: Creature with Darkvision (60ft) attempts to perceive in darkness or dim light
mechanics.condition: Creature has the Darkvision trait out to 60 feet
mechanics.outcome: Creature treats darkness within 60 feet as dim light and dim light within 60 feet as bright light

description_text: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For the duration, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.
